mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderdetail (order_id, product_id, amount) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT orderdetail.id, orders.id order_id, orders.createtime, product.id product_id, orderdetail.amount, product.title, product.price FROM (SELECT id,username FROM users WHERE username = #{username})users_temp LEFT JOIN orders ON users_temp.id = orders.user_id LEFT JOIN orderdetail ON orders.id = orderdetail.order_id LEFT JOIN product ON orderdetail.product_id = product.id ORDER BY orders.createtime
